ModMetaData.name: [M3] [Fork] Lord of the Rims - Men and Beasts [1.4 - 1.6]
ModMetaData.author: mupe3, Jecrell
ModMetaData.description:
[img]https://i.imgur.com/F9Pv3pa.png[/img] Lord of the Rims - Men and Beasts Adds equipment of Men and some creatures of Middle-Earth. Forked to remove dependencies
[img]https://i.imgur.com/9EUqtcn.png[/img] i want to do better showcases but for now this will have to do [img]https://i.imgur.com/5Ccvmyy.png[/img]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/XzjgGHm.png[/img] Q: Is this safe to add or remove midgame? A: Yes its safe to add and should be safe to remove midgame.
[img]https://i.imgur.com/cEpnXyu.png[/img] A Fork of Jecrells mod https://github.com/Lord-of-the-Rims-DevTeam/Lord-of-the-Rims---Men-and-Beasts
[img]https://i.imgur.com/yoI0PuL.png[/img] [list] [*] See if the the error persists if you just have this mod and its requirements active. [*] If not, try adding your other mods until it happens again. [*] For best support, please use Discord for error-reporting. [/list]
